ValidationRule.description: Check that owner is a queue and disposition is either Approve/Denied
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Disposition__c, 'Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Disposition__c, 'Denied')), OR(Owner_Type__c = 'QUEUE',
Owner:User.Full_Name__c = "Marketo Sync" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please be sure to change the owner from a Queue/Marketo Sync before approving or denying the Deal Reg.
